resources.string: By pressing accept you agree to Aptoide\'s %1$s and %2$s
Please accept our %1$s and %2$s to continue using Aptoide. These documents include all details about our relationship and how we store your data.
By joining Aptoide you agree to Aptoide\'s Terms and Conditions and Content Policy for Developers.

Find exclusive and tailored content in different stores

AppCoins is the cryptocurrency for in-app transactions. You can earn AppCoins Credits when installing your favourite apps and use them to make in-app purchases, like buying gems or upgrading your game!
Open it to get it automatically configured. You\'ll receive your rewards here and it\'ll process all your transactions!

Get AppCoins Credits for free! Download any of the apps of the bundle %1$s, in the homepage, and spend 2 minutes in it. The AppCoins Wallet will process your reward, and you can use it to buy your favorite items in any app with the symbol %2$s.

You\'ll identify the apps on which you can spend your AppCoins Credits with the symbol %s, and every time you buy an item you\'ll get a bonus in AppCoins Credits! Don\'t worry if you don\'t have AppCoins yet, you\'ll still be able to use your bank card, PayPal account or even ask a friend to send you the funds.
Try this app for 2 minutes and get\10%s
Try this app for 2 minutes and get\10%1$s %2$s
The cryptocurrency for the app economy is here! Get free AppCoins by using your favorite apps.

Install the following apps and get up to %s AppCoins Credits to spend in your favorite games!
First, get the AppCoins Wallet to receive your AppCoins Credits.
Then install any of these games to earn AppCoins Credits!
Start the happy and mystery journey with various candies in sweet wonderland!
Welcome to the Jungle! Release your beast and jump into battle royale multiplayer battles!
A free beauty camera and a global community of photography with over 800 million users.
This is just a security thing
Your AppCoins Credits will be available in your wallet soon! Enjoy your gaming!
A new sandbox survival mobile game that features the utmost fun of building and firing.
Build your army, construct a city and destroy your enemies on the battlefield.
Beat the banker by taking deals or simply not and holding out to reveal your briefcase.
Fight for the glory in a world of Elysians! It offers quality multiplayer brawls and 1v1 combats.
Help Hercules and Megara undo the damage done by the vengeful Gods in this greek adventure.
Intense real-time combat in a huge fantasy world! Join friends to clash rivals in the Arena.
Driven by their ambition and greed, Lords seek power and shatter the peace that once reigned.
An explosion-laden, arcade racing game that will have you feeling like a badass in seconds.
A 2D mobile shooter centered around an army of mercenaries trying to save the world.
Earn %s APPC Credits by installing apps and spend them in your favorite games!
An addictive game that successfully combines strategy and time management features!
Escape all the obstacles in the jungle, with this incredibly fun game.
Take control of a Hungry Shark and go on a frantic ocean rampage to survive as long as possible.
One of the best combinations of arcade Shoot \'Em Up and Monster Collecting Games.
Fight against powerful enemies and discover new virtual worlds in this unique action RPG game.
Tell us your AppCoins wallet address. Once you create a wallet, you\'ll find the address when pressing on \'Receive\'.
The AppCoins Wallet is your tool not only for receiving your APPC but also to process payments.
A great fun words game available offline. Find all the words for every level!
Reveal the hidden answer by eliminating letter tiles. A great brain challenge!
The CVV is the three-number code that appears in the signature bar on the back of your card.
